      • getUpdateInterval

        public double getUpdateInterval()
        Bezier curves are neither linear nor a function. Thus, update intervals are undefined.
        Specified by:
        getUpdateInterval in interface Segment
        Returns:

      • transform

        public void transform(AffineTransform affine)
        Description copied from interface: Segment
        Performs this Segment's cumulative operations on this AffineTransform since the last call. If this Segment has been completed and is no longer valid, this method does nothing.
        Specified by:
        transform in interface Segment

        public boolean isValid()
        Description copied from interface: Segment

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        true if this Segment hasn't been started or is in progress, false otherwise.
